item.description:
North Conway Balloon Festival is scheduled to take place at Schouler Park on June 11-13. It is a 3-day (well, a 2.5 actually) activity which includes hot air balloon rides (including an hour-long scenic one over Mount Washington Valley), music and theatrical performances, shopping, dining, etc. North Conway, located in the middle of the valley, is a perfect location for such an event as it features plenty of outdoor activities (hiking, kayaking, etc), good places to eat, interesting shops, and tons of other attractions.

This is also a good opportunity to meet members of Wedeln ski and outdoors club. The club owns a house in North Conway (10-15 min from the center of balloon action) where you can stay for $20/person/night (21+ please). The members are a riot, and you are guaranteed to have fun even if you don't stay for the whole duration. The plans and headcounts are still evolving, so please do let us know if/when you'd like to stay at the house as we need to ensure someone is there to let you in.

Please note that a 1-hour scenic rides cost $175 and require advanced reservation. Please call or email Howard Stanton at 603-356-2332 or howard@metcoffeehouse.com for more information.

Additional festival information can be found at the websites below:
http://www.mtwashingt...
http://tinyurl.com/36...
item.name: North Conway Balloon Festival
